hymn.title: My Lord and I

layout.singingstanza: I have a Friend so pre -- cious, So ver -- y dear to me, He loves me with a ten -- der love, He loves me faith -- ful -- ly; I could not live a -- part from Him, I love to feel Him nigh; And so we dwell to -- geth -- er, My Lord and I.

lyrics.stanza: I have a Friend so precious, So very dear to me, He loves me with a tender love, He loves me faithfully; I could not live apart from Him, I love to feel Him nigh; And so we dwell together, My Lord and I.

I tell Him all my sorrows, I tell Him all my joys, I tell Him all that pleases me, I tell Him what annoys; He tells me what I ought to do, Hs tells me what to try; And so we dwell together, My Lord and I.

He knows how I am longing Some weary soul to win, And so He bids me go and speak A loving word for Him; He bids me tell His wondrous love, And why He came to die; And so we dwell together, My Lord and I.
